content: Estimates of the Real Natural Rate of Interest   from Different Economic Models*  May 19, 2016 12  *This exhibit was drawn from figure 1 in Janet Yellen, “The Economic Outlook and   Monetary Policy,” remarks at the Economic Club of Washington, December 2.
